OOC: First off, does Rampage's controller got anything about the link 
between AzureBlade and him (protoform X and Z)?

BIC: The spark rose from the ruins of the CR chambers in Maximal city. 
It stopped about three feet from the ground. After a few moments, it 
went flying in the blue.

Spark: Freeeeee!!!!!! Ah! This feels good! I don't even need my wings 
to fly!

It came down from where it came. A destroyed robotic body layed on the 
floor. It was AzureBlade's

Spark: WHA...? How can I see myself? Am I hurt so bad? Am I just a 
spark? NO! IT CAN'T BE!!!!!!

The spark remained there, looking at its old body.
